query: SELECT id, name, bundle_config FROM reminder_templates WHERE is_bundle = 1 ORDER BY id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4WYXdTZ2RFuJQah.8fcf44c6f992 --database SwQCxo7pxW6R8kkqwZSJsv --execute SELECT id, name, bundle_config FROM reminder_templates WHERE is_bundle = 1 ORDER BY id;

rows.name: Standard Broiler Cycle (42 Days)
rows.bundle_config: [{"category": "vaccination", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Administer Marek's disease vaccine to day-old chicks", "name": "Day 1 - Marek's Disease Vaccination", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 7, "description": "First dose of Newcastle disease vaccine via drinking water", "name": "Day 7 - Newcastle Disease (First Dose)", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Administer Infectious Bursal Disease (Gumboro) vaccine", "name": "Day 14 - Gumboro Disease Vaccination", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Booster dose of Newcastle disease vaccine", "name": "Day 21 - Newcastle Disease (Booster)", "priority": "high"}]}, {"category": "feed_transition", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Begin with starter feed (high protein 22-24%)", "name": "Day 0 - Start Starter Feed", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 10, "description": "Prepare for transition to grower feed, start mixing", "name": "Day 10 - Prepare Grower Feed Transition", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Complete transition to grower feed (20% protein)", "name": "Day 14 - Complete Grower Feed Transition", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 28, "description": "Begin finisher feed (18% protein) for market preparation", "name": "Day 28 - Transition to Finisher Feed", "priority": "high"}]}, {"category": "environmental_check", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Verify brooding temperature at 32-35°C, check heat source", "name": "Day 1 - Initial Brooding Temperature Check", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 7, "description": "Gradually reduce temperature, check ventilation", "name": "Day 7 - Reduce Temperature to 29-32°C", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Continue temperature reduction, monitor bird behavior", "name": "Day 14 - Temperature Adjustment to 26-29°C", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Set final growing temperature, optimize ventilation", "name": "Day 21 - Final Temperature Setting 21-24°C", "priority": "medium"}]}, {"category": "biosecurity", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 0, "description": "Verify house disinfection, footbaths ready, visitor log in place", "name": "Day 0 - Pre-Placement Biosecurity Check", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 7, "description": "Check footbath effectiveness, equipment sanitization, pest control", "name": "Day 7 - Weekly Biosecurity Audit", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Review visitor logs, check perimeter security, rodent control", "name": "Day 14 - Mid-Cycle Biosecurity Review", "priority": "medium"}, {"dayOffset": 28, "description": "Prepare for catching crew, verify transport biosecurity", "name": "Day 28 - Pre-Harvest Biosecurity Protocol", "priority": "high"}]}, {"category": "milestone", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 7, "description": "Sample weight check - target 170-180g, assess uniformity", "name": "Day 7 - First Week Weight Check", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 14, "description": "Weight check target 450-500g, calculate FCR, mortality review", "name": "Day 14 - Two Week Performance Review", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Weight target 900-1000g, FCR should be ~1.4, assess flock health", "name": "Day 21 - Three Week Assessment", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 35, "description": "Final weight assessment, FCR calculation, market readiness check", "name": "Day 35 - Pre-Market Evaluation", "priority": "urgent"}]}, {"category": "performance_alert", "enabled": true, "reminders": [{"dayOffset": 3, "description": "Review first 72-hour mortality - should be <1%, investigate if higher", "name": "Day 3 - Early Mortality Check", "priority": "urgent"}, {"dayOffset": 10, "description": "Compare growth to standards, adjust feed if underperforming", "name": "Day 10 - Growth Rate Assessment", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 21, "description": "Cumulative mortality should be <3%, FCR on target, uniformity >85%", "name": "Day 21 - Mid-Cycle Performance Review", "priority": "high"}, {"dayOffset": 30, "description": "Project final weights, calculate expected yield, plan harvest date", "name": "Day 30 - Final Performance Projection", "priority": "high"}]}]
